item.title: SSH error tips
item.description: ssh_exchange_identification read connection reset by peer https://phoenixnap.com/kb/fix-connection-reset-by-peer-ssh-error There are typos at /etc/hosts.allow, in example: shd: 10.11.8.15 it should be sshd: 10.11.8.15
